title: Katie Price's ex Charles Drury claims she stayed up for days on cocaine binges and rates her 1/10 in bed
text:

Katie Price's ex boyfriend Charles Drury says they went on cocaine binges together in a string of sensational claims about their brief fling.

The builder, 22, rated her "one out of ten" in bed after they romped on their first date.

Charles claims that on the first night they met they binged on drugs and drink before sleeping together hours later.

When he woke up the next morning she hadn't been to sleep and had trashed their hotel room, he said.

"We did a few lines each to start off with before I crashed out," he told The Sun Online .

(Image: Facebook)

(Image: Brett D. Cove / Splash News)

"I'm not sure how many were done after that. I woke up in the morning and the party was still going on for her."

And he wasn't impressed with her performance in the bedroom, saying: "For any lad it's like a dream come true, but it wasn't anything to brag about to my mates."

He claims the worst binge was when she went four days without sleeping.

Charles said Katie is "all over the place" and sometimes disappears for days at a time.

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

Within two weeks Charles was living in her mucky mansion after she dumped Kris Boyson for him.

They would sleep in the annex because her house is currently "unlivable".

He believes she cheated on him during their fling, but she would never admit to it.

Their relationship came to an end when Charles saw pictures of her leaving Kris Boyson's house.

(Image: CRYSTAL PIX / SplashNews.com)

Charles said: "It was a shock. I felt mugged off. But it was relief with the suspicions and gut feelings I had, at least I knew it was true."

Katie previously admitted to taking cocaine weekly for six months as she struggled to cope with her mum's terminal illness and ex husband Kieran Hayler's cheating.

She had checked into rehab and was treated for trauma and depression.

A spokesperson for Katie Price said: "There is no truth in the allegation that she is taking drugs every day and has made significant steps to being drug free - there have been lapses in the past but they are just that, not a regular event. Katie is still in recovery and making progress."
description: Charles claims that on the first night they met they binged on drugs and drink before sleeping together hours later
